## Imports
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
h2o::h2o.no_progress()
devtools::load_all()
```

## Script parameters
```{r}
database <- "test_signauxfaibles"
collection <- "Features"
actual_period <- as.Date("2019-03-01")
last_batch <- "1905"
min_effectif <- 10
retrain_model <- TRUE
type <- "dataframe"
export_type <- c("csv", "mongodb")
```

```{r}
connect_to_h2o()
```

```{r}
task <- sf_task(
  verbose = TRUE,
  database,
  collection,
  experiment_aim = "Reference evaluation canvas",
  experiment_description = "This experiment fixes the conditions for the evaluation of a new algorithm compared to former versions"
)
```

```{r}
task <- load_hist_data(
  task = task,
  batch = "1905",
  subsample = 200000
)
```

```{r}
task <- hold_out(task)
task <- prepare(task, data_names = c("train_data"))
task  <- train(task)
```

```{r}
# task <- save(task)
```

```{r}
task <- load_new_data(
  task = task,
  last_batch = "1905",
  periods = actual_period
  )
```

```{r}
task <- prepare(task, data_names = c("validation_data"))
task <- predict(task, data_names = c("validation_data"))
```

```{r}
task <- evaluate(task, data_name = "validation_data")
task <- log(task)
```
